name: Aki Maku
description:
Take control of Aki Maku through the forest of spirits, solve puzzles and go deeper and deeper into the wood's. Who now's what it lays beneath?                                                  

This game is a demo of an on hold project that's been sitting for a while, and we thought you might enjoy and we could have a little bit of feedback.

We would love to know your opinion so when you finish, we would appreciate if you could fill the form at the end (https://forms.gle/Ag24KanCjSHWtkws8).

Hope you like it, we can't wait to see what you think about it!
